title: Team Looking for Serious top/mid.
body: We are a new serious team looking to go onto tournaments and further. We are looking for dedicated players who are willing to learn and adapt to team play and be able to take criticism. We are also looking for players who will be available most evenings.

replies.body:
top main, p1 sq, saviour nathan is name.
available in evenings and flexible weekends
add me if interested
do you need a top and a mid or just a mid? if you need both then me and my buddy would like to tryout. we're Gold III and Gold II (peak Plat I).
What rank? Player of five years, Previously competitive, re climbing, currently B1 going into Silver: Illenia Eclipse Top, Mid, JG, ADC main
Top main here. Free all day every day :) looking for a serious team! Add me in game :)
I play top. I'm available typically after 9pm CST/US every weekend day night and can be flexible as far as my availability on weekends.
